name: Criminal: Director's Notes
detailed_description: Sit down with Director Ariel Vromen for this hybrid scene/commentary and hear about the making of several of Criminal's choice scenes. 14 scenes from Criminal have been personally selected by the Director as he offers insight and behind the scenes access.
